Package ohos.agp.render

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Shader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupShader, LinearShader, PixelMapShader, RadialShader, SweepShader

    public abstract class Shader
extends Object
    Base class used to shade colors during drawing.

    This class creates a shader based on the specified TileMode, colors, and shading area. The created shader shades colors on a drawn object.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Shader.TileMode
      Specifies how to shade colors on the part outside of the shading area defined by the Shader.

    • Field Detail

      • intColors

        public int[] intColors
        Indicates the int values representing the shading colors of this shader. The shading colors passed in the constructor will be converted into int values, which are saved in intColors for other methods to use.
        Since:
        3

      • mTileMode

        protected int mTileMode
        Indicates the tileMode attribute of the current Shader object.
        Since:
        3

      • shaderColors

        public Color[] shaderColors
        Indicates the array of shading colors of this shader.
        Since:
        3

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shader

        public Shader​(Color[] colors,
              Shader.TileMode newTileMode)
        A parameterized constructor used to create a Shader instance.

        This constructor stores the input array of shading colors and the tile mode in the Shader attributes. The array of shading colors will be converted into int values for other methods to use.

        Parameters:
        colors - Indicates the array of shading colors.
        newTileMode - Indicates the tile mode used to shade colors when the drawn object exceeds the shading area defined by the shader.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • getTileMode

        public Shader.TileMode getTileMode​()
        Obtains the TileMode attribute of this Shader.

        The tile mode specifies how to shade colors on the part outside of the shading area defined by the shader. The tile mode can be TileMode#CLAMP_TILEMODE, TileMode#REPEAT_TILEMODE, or TileMode#MIRROR_TILEMODE.

        Returns:
        Returns the tile mode of the shader.
        Since:
        3

      • getShaderColors

        public Color[] getShaderColors​()
        Obtains the array of shading colors of this Shader.
        Returns:
        Returns the Shader#shaderColors of the Shader.
        Since:
        3

      • setShaderMatrix

        public void setShaderMatrix​(Matrix matrix)
        Set shader's matrix.

        Clean the native shader object if the param is null or identity.

        Parameters:
        matrix - Indicates the local matrix need to be set.
        Since:
        3
